original: 吳郡富春人，孫策、孫權的堂兄弟。隨孫策平定江東，立功頗多。但因認定孫權無力保住江東，暗中與曹操往來，被人舉發，而遭流放幽禁。又或如陳琳所言，被孫權處死。
text: Wujun Fuchun, cousin of Sun Ce and Sun Quan. Follow Sun Ce to pacify Jiangdong and make many contributions. But because he believed that Sun Quan was unable to keep Jiangdong, he secretly interacted with Cao Cao, was reported, and was put into exile. Or as Chen Lin said, he was executed by Sun Quan.
